history.narrative: Law 3-33, the “Newborn Health Insurance Act of 1979,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-12, which was referred to the Committee on Public Services and Consumer Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 17, 1979, and July 31, 1979, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 31, 1979, it was assigned Act No. 3-99 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
